Name: Tissina Khyret
Traits: Dark Devotion. Tissina has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened. Innate Spellcasting. Tissina's spellcasting ability is Charisma. She can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:At will: thaumaturgy Spellcasting. Tissina is a 4th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Wisdom. Tissina has the following cleric spells prepared:Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy1st level (4 slots): command, inflict wounds, shield of faith2nd level (3 slots): hold person, spiritual weapon
Actions: Multiattack. Tissina makes two melee attacks. Dagger. Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. Or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
